author: mkfrost4
title: St. Pat's weekend
text: My daughter and I enjoyed our stay here very much. Room was very clean and enough room for us both. The hotel staff was very friendly and mostly very helpful when we asked for suggestions of restaurants, and other things to do around the hotel. Gerard in the bar is wonderful, very nice and helpful too. We will be returning in May and staying here again.
